analyzed: theḥ apadāna  padu mukkhi pa vagga
translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Padumuttara
and was pleased with my hands.
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving lamps.
there was one lord of the land,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā padīpadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā padīpadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done what the Awakened One taught.”🔽Thus the elder Padīpadāyaka recited these verses.
The Elder Padīpadāyaka’s Birth Story, the fourth.
